revised_title: Magneto-Hydrodynamic Boundary Layer in Two-Dimensional Steady Flow: The Falkner-Skan Problem
tldr: The article investigates the flow of a viscous liquid past a semi-infinite flat plate against an adverse pressure gradient using an iterative method. The author compares the results with Hartree's numerical solution and finds better agreement when starting with a function that satisfies the boundary conditions at the plate. The study also explores the behavior of the solution at infinity and discusses the differences between the two methods.
